phrases: I have been thinking this whole time.
What should I do for Norman's sake?
to give up and free myself of the pain.
I will never, ever give up.
I will not let Norman die in vain.
So we are always thinking the same thing in the end.
I came here to talk about that.
I wanted to talk to you, too.
These past two months, we could not really talk since we were worried about Mom watching us.
I did not want Mom to figure out our true intentions.
Even though we were not doing anything, Mom never stopped watching us.
But we could use that against her.
If she is watching me, I could keep her eyes away from people other than me.
Training for the escape, and all other preparations.
Now, how will you run away?
Let us run away tomorrow afternoon, before you get shipped out.
It is reckless to go out during the day.
We should leave at night when it is easier to hide.
She is always watching us, and she is always holding one of the younger ones.
She will be doing that during the day, and at night, the babies are in her room.
In order to escape with everyone, we will have to shake Mom off,
and separate her from the little ones.
And then, past the wall is a cliff.
We cannot climb down from it.
If we are escaping, it will be through the bridge.
I am sure there is security to begin with,
and once they find out there is been an escape, the guards will rush there.
Plus, it is near the headquarters.
So, what are you going to do?
I think this is the best answer.
At night, we will light the House on fire.
You are going to start a fire?
When Mom is distracted putting it out, we will lead everyone outside, saying it is an evacuation.
If we seal the door to the secret room,
Mom cannot notify headquarters, and headquarters will think it is a fire, not an escape.
Then security will not go towards the bridge.
We can escape through it then.
As a bonus, I also hid ten Molotovs behind some rocks in the forest.
Do not underestimate my six years of preparations.
Throw those Molotovs into the neighboring plants on the way to the bridge.
If all goes well, there will be another fire to make security even scarcer.
Since it is nighttime, no one will be in the forest.
So instead of tomorrow, let us run away tonight, right now.
This place is the farthest distance away from everyone is rooms.
They can escape before the fires get to them.
They have trained to run in formation through tag, right?
To tell you the truth, I am still against the idea of taking everyone.
Especially after hearing there is a cliff beyond those walls.
Even if you do take some, it should only be Don and Gilda.
You should at least leave the babies behind.
For their sake, and for yours, too.
But you will not listen even if I stop you.
And it is better than having you stay behind and not escape.
So I will not say anything more.
to throw over the Molotov bottles?
And I am worried about one more thing.
Even if we start a fire, what if Mom abandons the building?
She might give up on putting out the fire and refuse to take her eyes off of us, the merchandise.
There is a good possibility of that happening.
That is why starting a fire will not be enough.
If we do not stop Mom, then we will not have any chances of escaping from her.
I just have to do this.
The perfect scorer with the set shipment date will burn up.
She will not be able to abandon me.
I have been waiting for this day.
I decided this a long time ago.
I have never really been interested in studying or reading.
But I endured it, and I worked hard to improve my value to the highest it could be.
I am a feast that they have been waiting for.
I am going to take that away from them tonight.
Right before the harvest they have been looking forward to.
Do not think you can eat me.
Do not think you can serve me.
I do not give a crap!
Also, it is fine this way.
I have watched my family die all these years.
And they were all good kids.
Please, do not let me, or Norman, die in vain.
It was a life I wanted to curse, but the time I spent with everyone was really fun.
Did he set himself on fire?
Also please get the babies in my room!
Why are not the sprinklers working?
Emma, you need to get out of here too.
Sorry, but I am not going to let you die.
Not me, nor the other children.
I brought what you asked for, Emma.
And everyone is already good to go.
Do you still want to die, you blockhead?
Stop yapping because we are escaping!
It will create a certain smell.
I will take it out, so sit with your ear toward me.
You can die anywhere, and it does not have to be here.
I will show you something cool, so shut up and come.
I am going to write down the plan from here.
He is doing all this so you and I do not get killed.
He did not include himself in the equation.
He has no intention of escaping.
He plans on dying inside this House.
He is going to set himself on fire to distract Mom, and let us run away.
I am not going to let him do that.
That is why I am writing down the plan I came up with.
It will happen in two months.
Probably the night before Ray's birthday.
Use the fire that Ray's planning to start, save Ray, outwit Mom, and escape with everyone.
I also got an unexpected item.
I am counting on you, Emma.
Please take care of Ray and our siblings.
We will run to the wall!
Do they all know about the House and the escape?
Let us tell more kids other than Don and Gilda, Norman.
Don, Gilda, and probably everyone else are not as immature as we think.
If we are going to run from those monsters,
I think it is better they know about the dangers, and should willingly join our escape.
And Mom only suspects the oldest kids, and not everyone else.
Do you think it is reckless?
But with this plan, we can catch Mom off guard.
Realistically, this is the only way to escape with everyone.
What do you want to know?
Whether it be about the farm or about the headquarters...
There are humans outside who have not been eaten.
Then you do not know how long the demons have been around?
We let them hear what Sister said.
For the rest, we spent two months slowly recruiting them in.
Mom probably did not notice at all.
That Emma was only pretending to have given up, but was actually giving everyone instructions.
Training for the escape, and all other preparations.
Nat and I will climb up first.
Then we will pull everyone up.
Just do it like how we trained, and you will be fine!
Everyone is going to escape safely.
I will not let you escape, my adorable children.
